title: Payment API Returning 500 Internal Server Error
description: Payment processing API is throwing 500 errors for all transactions. Error started approximately 30 minutes ago.
solution:
1. Checked application logs
2. Verified database connectivity
3. Increased connection pool settings
4. Scaled API pods horizontally
reasoning: Database connection pool exhaustion during high traffic caused API failures.

title: Memory Leak in Data Processing Service
description: Data processing service showing increasing memory usage, crashing after 48 hours of uptime.
solution:
1. Analyzed heap dumps
2. Fixed object retention in cache
3. Implemented proper resource cleanup
reasoning: Memory leak caused by improper cache management.

title: SSL Certificate Expiration Warning
description: SSL certificate expires in 7 days for api.company.com.
solution:
1. Generated new SSL certificate
2. Updated load balancer
3. Verified installation

title: Redis Cache High Memory Usage
description: Redis cluster memory usage at 85%, affecting performance.
solution:
1. Analyzed key space usage
2. Implemented TTL for cache keys
3. Scaled Redis cluster
reasoning: High memory usage causing cache evictions.

title: MongoDB Replication Lag
description: Secondary nodes showing 300s replication lag behind primary.
solution:
1. Increased network bandwidth
2. Optimized write operations
3. Added monitoring

title: Kubernetes Node Memory Pressure
description: Worker node under memory pressure, pods being evicted.
solution:
1. Identified memory-hungry pods
2. Adjusted resource limits
3. Added node

title: ElasticSearch Cluster Yellow Status
description: ES cluster health yellow, unassigned shards detected.
solution:
1. Rebalanced shards
2. Adjusted replica settings
3. Monitored recovery

title: CI/CD Pipeline Failures
description: Build pipeline failing due to dependency issues.
solution:
1. Updated dependencies
2. Fixed version conflicts
3. Added integrity checks

title: API Rate Limiting Issues
description: Users receiving 429 errors during peak hours.
solution:
1. Adjusted rate limits
2. Implemented request queuing
3. Updated documentation
reasoning: Rate limits too restrictive for usage.

title: Backup Job Failures
description: Daily backup jobs failing due to storage issues.
solution:
1. Added storage capacity
2. Optimized retention policy
3. Fixed backup script

title: Log Processing Delays
solution:
1. Scaled processors
2. Optimized filters
3. Increased buffers

title: DNS Resolution Failures
description: Intermittent DNS resolution issues in Kubernetes cluster.
solution:
1. Scaled CoreDNS
2. Updated configuration
3. Added monitoring

title: Message Queue Backlog
solution:
1. Scaled consumers
2. Optimized processing
3. Added DLQ

title: WebSocket Connection Drops
solution:
1. Adjusted timeouts
2. Fixed load balancing
3. Added reconnect logic

title: High CPU Usage - Analytics
description: Analytics service showing sustained high CPU.
solution:
1. Optimized queries
2. Added caching
3. Implemented batching

title: File Upload Errors
description: S3 upload failures for large files.
solution:
1. Implemented chunking
2. Added retry logic
3. Updated timeout

title: Auth Token Validation Errors
solution:
1. Fixed time sync
2. Updated JWT library
3. Added logging
reasoning: Clock skew causing token validation issues.

title: GraphQL Query Timeouts
description: Complex queries timing out in GraphQL API.
solution:
1. Implemented query complexity analysis
2. Added field restrictions
3. Optimized resolvers

title: CDN Cache Miss Rate High
description: Increased origin server load from cache misses.
solution:
1. Updated cache rules
2. Fixed cache keys
3. Monitored hit rate
